description:
The ordination ceremony has been called off. Queen Boudica refuses to surrender and leads her forces in a do-or-die resistance. The Knights-sorcerers charge into battle, but they face a crisis when they lose the ability to use magic due to the strange machine supplied by the Merchant Barons. Meanwhile, Seth finds Diabal again underneath the castle, and Diabal tells him they are something like brothers. also, Doc finds a book called "Book of Truth" in the castle archive and hopes it will hold a clue to the location of Radiant, but then...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le lieu de la bataille décisive: Battlefield
